classical_renaissance.name: Classical Renaissance
classical_renaissance.description: Emulates the refined techniques of Leonardo da Vinci and Raphael with sfumato effects, balanced composition, and idealized beauty
classical_renaissance.positive_prompt: ((oil painting on canvas:1.3)), ((Renaissance masterpiece:1.2)), sfumato technique, chiaroscuro lighting, ((fine glazing layers:1.1)), smooth blending, idealized beauty, ((anatomically perfect:1.2)), golden ratio composition, ((subtle gradations:1.1)), luminous skin tones, ((egg tempera underpainting:0.8)), refined brushwork, ((classical portraiture:1.2)), museum quality, old master painting
classical_renaissance.negative_prompt: digital art, 3d render, photograph, anime, cartoon, ((rough brushstrokes)), ((impasto)), modern art, abstract, pixelated, low quality, blurry, ((harsh contrasts)), neon colors, oversaturated
tips: Use ControlNet Canny at 0.6-0.7 weight for facial features
Add 'pyramid composition' for group portraits
Lower denoising to 0.35-0.4 for better face preservation
Consider adding artist names like 'in the style of Leonardo da Vinci' at low weight (0.5-0.7)

baroque_drama.name: Baroque Drama
baroque_drama.description: Captures the dramatic lighting and emotional intensity of Caravaggio and Rembrandt with strong tenebrism effects
baroque_drama.positive_prompt: ((oil on canvas:1.4)), ((Baroque masterpiece:1.3)), ((dramatic chiaroscuro:1.4)), tenebrism, ((deep shadows and bright highlights:1.3)), ((Rembrandt lighting:1.2)), emotional intensity, ((rich impasto:1.1)), golden brown palette, ((theatrical composition:1.2)), ((dramatic gestures:1.1)), old master technique, ((glazing and scumbling:1.1)), museum piece
baroque_drama.negative_prompt: flat lighting, pastel colors, anime, digital art, 3d render, photograph, ((even illumination)), cartoon, low contrast, modern minimalist, watercolor, pencil drawing
tips: Use both Canny and Depth ControlNet for complex compositions
Emphasize single light source for authentic Baroque feel
Add 'candlelit' or 'window light' for indoor scenes
Increase contrast in post-processing for more drama

impressionist_light.name: Impressionist Light
impressionist_light.description: Recreates the loose brushwork and light effects of Monet and Renoir with visible strokes and vibrant color
impressionist_light.positive_prompt: ((impressionist oil painting:1.4)), ((loose brushstrokes:1.3)), ((dappled light:1.2)), plein air painting, ((broken color technique:1.2)), ((visible canvas texture:1.1)), ((vibrant palette:1.2)), ((capturing fleeting moment:1.1)), alla prima technique, ((sun-drenched scene:1.2)), ((optical color mixing:1.1)), French impressionism, ((feathery brushwork:1.2))
impressionist_light.negative_prompt: photorealistic, sharp details, ((smooth blending)), digital art, 3d render, anime, ((hard edges)), ((precise lines)), dark moody, gothic, hyperrealistic, airbrushed
tips: Lower ControlNet weight (0.4-0.5) for looser interpretation
Add time of day keywords: 'morning light', 'golden hour'
Use higher denoising (0.55-0.65) for more painterly effect
Consider adding 'garden scene' or 'water reflections' for classic subjects

post_impressionist_expression.name: Post-Impressionist Expression
post_impressionist_expression.description: Channels the expressive brushwork of Van Gogh and structural approach of CÃ©zanne with bold strokes and emotional color
post_impressionist_expression.positive_prompt: ((post-impressionist oil painting:1.4)), ((thick impasto technique:1.4)), ((swirling brushstrokes:1.3)), ((expressive color:1.3)), ((Van Gogh style energy:1.2)), ((bold paint application:1.3)), ((emotional brushwork:1.2)), ((vibrant complementary colors:1.2)), ((textured canvas:1.1)), ((rhythmic patterns:1.2)), heavy paint layers, ((dynamic movement:1.1))
post_impressionist_expression.negative_prompt: photorealistic, smooth surface, digital art, 3d render, ((subtle colors)), ((thin paint)), watercolor, pencil sketch, anime, ((muted tones)), flat painting
tips: Use Regional Prompter to apply different stroke patterns to subject vs background
Increase denoising to 0.65-0.7 for more artistic interpretation
Add 'cypress trees', 'starry night', or 'wheat fields' for Van Gogh themes
Consider using two passes: first for structure, second for texture

romantic_landscape.name: Romantic Landscape
romantic_landscape.description: Evokes the sublime landscapes of Turner and Constable with atmospheric effects and dramatic natural scenes
romantic_landscape.positive_prompt: ((romantic landscape oil painting:1.3)), ((atmospheric perspective:1.3)), ((sublime nature:1.2)), ((Turner-esque luminosity:1.2)), ((dramatic sky:1.3)), ((glazing technique:1.1)), ((soft edges:1.1)), ((atmospheric effects:1.2)), misty distance, ((golden light:1.2)), ((cloud study:1.1)), ((impasto highlights:1.1)), British romanticism
romantic_landscape.negative_prompt: digital art, 3d render, anime, photograph, ((hard edges)), ((oversaturated)), neon colors, urban scene, modern architecture, cartoon, low quality
tips: Use Depth ControlNet for maintaining landscape layers
Add weather keywords: 'stormy', 'misty morning', 'sunset glow'
Lower ControlNet weight for background elements (0.3-0.4)
Include 'sublime' and 'majestic' for emotional impact

portrait_master.name: Portrait Master
portrait_master.description: Emulates John Singer Sargent's confident brushwork and sophisticated portrait techniques with elegant simplicity
portrait_master.positive_prompt: ((masterful portrait oil painting:1.4)), ((Sargent-style brushwork:1.3)), ((confident paint strokes:1.3)), ((elegant simplicity:1.2)), ((bravura technique:1.2)), ((economy of brushwork:1.1)), ((luminous flesh tones:1.3)), ((sophisticated color harmony:1.2)), alla prima painting, ((gestural accuracy:1.2)), ((society portrait:1.1)), refined technique
portrait_master.negative_prompt: overworked, muddy colors, digital art, 3d render, anime, photograph, ((stiff pose)), amateur, cartoon, ((oversaturated)), harsh lighting
tips: Use OpenPose ControlNet for accurate pose preservation
Combine with Canny at low weight (0.3) for facial features
Keep denoising low (0.35-0.45) for maximum likeness
Add 'three-quarter view' or 'profile portrait' for classic poses

modern_abstract.name: Modern Abstract Oil
modern_abstract.description: Interprets subjects through abstract expressionism while maintaining recognizable forms, inspired by Rothko and Pollock
modern_abstract.positive_prompt: ((abstract expressionist oil painting:1.4)), ((bold gestural marks:1.3)), ((color field painting:1.2)), ((thick paint layers:1.3)), ((emotional abstraction:1.2)), ((spontaneous brushwork:1.2)), ((layered impasto:1.3)), ((dynamic composition:1.2)), mixed media effects, ((raw canvas showing:0.8)), ((drips and splatters:1.1)), contemporary art
modern_abstract.negative_prompt: photorealistic, precise details, ((traditional portrait)), digital art, 3d render, anime, ((tight brushwork)), smooth surface, classical composition
tips: Use very low ControlNet weight (0.3-0.4) for abstract interpretation
Higher denoising (0.65-0.75) allows more artistic freedom
Use Regional Prompter to maintain subject while abstracting background
Consider multiple passes with different abstract styles

photorealistic_oil.name: Photorealistic Oil
photorealistic_oil.description: Creates hyper-detailed oil paintings in the style of Chuck Close with meticulous attention to detail
photorealistic_oil.positive_prompt: ((photorealistic oil painting:1.5)), ((hyperdetailed brushwork:1.4)), ((Chuck Close technique:1.2)), ((meticulous detail:1.4)), ((smooth blending:1.3)), ((invisible brushstrokes:1.2)), ((multiple glazing layers:1.2)), ((perfect color matching:1.3)), ((sharp focus throughout:1.2)), contemporary realism, ((technical mastery:1.3))
photorealistic_oil.negative_prompt: loose brushwork, impressionistic, abstract, ((visible brushstrokes)), digital artifacts, 3d render, anime, cartoon, ((painterly)), rough texture
tips: Use high ControlNet weight (0.75-0.85) for maximum accuracy
Keep denoising very low (0.3-0.4) to preserve details
Consider using tile ControlNet for ultra-high resolution
Use Ultimate SD Upscale for maintaining detail at larger sizes

global_settings.universal_negative: low quality, worst quality, jpeg artifacts, blurry, out of focus, cropped, duplicate, deformed, disfigured
img2img_tips: Always start with lower denoising and increase gradually
Use multiple ControlNet units for complex subjects
Save seeds that work well for batch variations
Consider inpainting for specific areas that need refinement

face_preservation.description: Critical settings for maintaining facial recognition
face_preservation.backup_method: Use inpainting at 0.3 denoising for faces only

pet_preservation.tips: Use OpenPose for body structure, Canny for fur texture

techniques: Custom LoRA training for specific styles
